mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH,ARCHIVESEQID, THISORDER, RECORDNAME, ARCHIVETYPEID,ARCHIVECODE,RECORDSTYLE,RECORDSCODE ,ISDELETE,ISAZXT,ARCHIVESFCID,AUTHOR,AUTHORID,JCYRECORDCODE,PREVID,RECORDWH, EFFECTIVETIME,BASERECORDID,RECORDUUID,WJBID,WJBM,AUTHORIDCARD,ISCOVERIMG
mapper.insert:
select seq_FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS_id.nextval from dual
insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, ARCHIVECODE, JQBH, ARCHIVETYPEID, ARCHIVESEQID, RECORDSCODE, ISAZXT, ARCHIVESFCID, AUTHOR, AUTHORID, AJBH, THISORDER, RECORDNAME, ISDELETE, JCYRECORDCODE, PREVID, BASERECORDID, EFFECTIVETIME, RECORDUUID, WJBM, WJBID, AUTHORIDCARD,
ISCOVERIMG,
RECORDSTYLE,
RECORDWH,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{archivecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isazxt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivesfcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thisorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jcyrecordcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{effectivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recorduuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjbid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{iscoverimg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{recordstyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recordwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS
UPDATETIME = SYSDATE,
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THISORDER = #{thisorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDNAME = #{recordname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVECODE = #{archivecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDSTYLE = #{recordstyle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDSCODE = #{recordscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDELETE = #{isdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVESFCID = #{archivesfcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISAZXT = #{isazxt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTHORID = #{authorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREVID = #{previd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JCYRECORDCODE = #{jcyrecordcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDWH = #{recordwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVETIME = #{effectivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BASERECORDID = #{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDUUID = #{recorduuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIDCARD = #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISCOVERIMG = #{iscoverimg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS where SCBJ=0
AND ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ISDELETE <= 1
AND ISDELETE >= 1
AND recordstyle <> #{notRecordstyle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
ORDER BY THISORDER ASC

SELECT NVL(MAX(THISORDER),0) FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVETYPEID = (SELECT ARCHIVETYPEID FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) AND ISDELETE < 2 AND THISORDER < 9999
SELECT NVL(MAX(THISORDER),0) FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RECORDSTYLE=1 AND ISDELETE < 2
SELECT NVL(MAX(THISORDER),0) FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RECORDSTYLE=1 AND RECORDSTYLE <> 0 AND ISDELETE < 2
select * from ( SELECT FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND RECORDSTYLE=1 AND ISDELETE < 2 order by THISORDER desc ) where rownum=1

select count(0) FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS r where 1=1 and scbj=0
and r.ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and r.ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND RECORDSTYLE <> 0
AND r.RECORDNAME LIKE '%'||#{recordname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT AR.* FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS AR WHERE AR.SCBJ = 0 AND AR.ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FUN_SUSPECT_RECORD SR WHERE SCBJ = 0 AND SUSPECTID = #{suspectid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND AR.ID = SR.RECORDID)) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SYS_RECORDORDER WHERE SCBJ = 0 AND RECORDSTYLE = 1 AND ARCHIVETYPE = #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) R ON A.RECORDSCODE = R.RECORDCODE WHERE R.RECORDTYPE = #{recordtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY r.defaultorder ASC

SELECT
from FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS where SCBJ=0 AND RECORDSCODE = #{recordscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND archivetypeid = (SELECT ID FROM fun_archive_type WHERE SCBJ=0 AND ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND recordtype= #{recordtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ) ORDER BY EFFECTIVETIME ASC

SELECT RECORDS.* FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS RECORDS, SYS_RECORDORDER RECORDORDER WHERE RECORDORDER.SCBJ = 0 AND RECORDS.SCBJ = 0 AND RECORDS.ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND RECORDS.RECORDSCODE = RECORDORDER.RECORDCODE AND RECORDORDER.RECORDTYPE = #{recordtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND RECORDORDER.ARCHIVETYPE = #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FUN_SUSPECT_RECORD SUSPECT WHERE SCBJ = 0 AND SUSPECT.RECORDID = RECORDS.ID AND SUSPECT.SUSPECTID = #{suspectid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) ORDER BY RECORDORDER.DEFAULTORDER ASC

SELECT
FROM (SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS R WHERE SCBJ = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM fun_archive_type TYPE WHERE TYPE.ID=r.archivetypeid AND type.Recordtype=#{recordtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYS_RECORDORDER S WHERE R.RECORDSCODE = S.RECORDCODE AND S.SCBJ=0 AND RECORDTYPE = #{recordtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ARCHIVETYPE = #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND S.DEFAULTORDER < #{defaultorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM fun_suspect_record s WHERE suspectid=#{suspectid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND r.id=s.recordid)
AND ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY R.THISORDER DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE SCBJ = 0 AND RECORDNAME LIKE '%'||#{recordname,jdbcType=DECIMAL}||'%' AND ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE SCBJ = 0 AND RECORDUUID= #{recorduuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ISACTIVE = 0

SELECT
FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE SCBJ = 0 AND RECORDUUID = (SELECT RECORDUUID FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ) AND ISACTIVE = 0
mapper.update:
update FUN_ARCHIVE_RECORDS
UPDATETIME = SYSDATE,
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THISORDER = #{thisorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDNAME = #{recordname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVETYPEID = #{archivetypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVESEQID = #{archiveseqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVECODE = #{archivecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDSTYLE = #{recordstyle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDSCODE = #{recordscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDELETE = #{isdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVESFCID = #{archivesfcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISAZXT = #{isazxt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTHORID = #{authorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREVID = #{previd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JCYRECORDCODE = #{jcyrecordcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDWH = #{recordwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVETIME = #{effectivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BASERECORDID = #{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORDUUID = #{recorduuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIDCARD = #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISCOVERIMG = #{iscoverimg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where RECORDUUID = #{recorduuid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fun_archive_records r WHERE r.scbj=0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_FILES f WHERE f.scbj=0 AND filecode = #{filecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.id=f.archiverecordid) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ seq WHERE seq.scbj=0 AND seq.isactive=0 AND seq.id=r.archiveseqid)

SELECT
FROM fun_archive_records re WHERE scbj=0 AND recordstyle >0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM fun_archive_type ty WHERE scbj=0 AND archiveseqid IN
#{item,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND re.archivetypeid=ty.id AND recordtype = #{recordtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY re.thisorder

SELECT
FROM fun_archive_records ar WHERE scbj=0 and recordwh IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_recordmessage rm WHERE rm.z IS NOT NULL AND rm.recordcode=ar.recordscode)
mapper.update: update fun_archive_records ar set UPDATETIME = SYSDATE ,ISDELETE = 2 where wjbm= #{wjbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and wjbid=#{wjbid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and exists (select 1 from fun_archive_sfc sfc where sfc.id=f.archivesfcid and sfc.issend=0)
mapper.select: SELECT FROM fun_archive_records ar WHERE scbj=0 AND RECORDUUID= #{recorduuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ISDELETE= 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FUN_ARCHIVE_SEQ seq WHERE seq.id=ar.archiveseqid AND seq.isfinal=0)
